profile:
Grand Alarms Ltd., a recognized Canadian company conveniently situated within the Greater?Toronto?Area, has built its reputation within the security industry by providing customers with the latest cutting?edge home electronics, whole?home security and information?networking that is designed to fit the modern lifestyle. Since the company’s establishment over a decade ago, Grand Alarms has been the trusted security company of choice to provide first?class security and home automation to customers across Canada.

Certified and active members of both the Home Builder’s Association and the Canadian Security Association, Grand Alarms offers proven solutions designed to equip each home with the amenities and the flexibility that best meet the needs of our customers. By offering industry?leading Smart?Home networking solutions, multi?room Audio Video Distribution, technologically advanced IP Alarm Monitoring components, and state?of?the?art Central Vacuums, home Surveillance components and Garage Door Openers, Grand Alarms has established a long list of dedicated customers who are benefiting from our elite services through?out their home.

Grand Alarms prides itself on providing each customer with an alarm system that is ready for the unexpected by centralizing and routing security to every corner of the home, blanketing it in protection and giving you piece of mind knowing that your family and possessions are secure. With Grand Alarms, every installation is performed by our highly trained technicians ensuring that the set?up and operation of your alarm system is entrusted only to those who can be trusted.

We are dedicated to maintaining a high level of effective and professional customer service in a number of languages that will best suit individual needs. With our cost effective plans and service, and a completely free full lifetime warranty, Grand Alarms continues to be the no. 1 Canadian choice for new homes, residences and businesses of all size.

Grand Alarms Ltd – Home Security solutions that bring comfort to your home and safety to your life.

profile:
Deluxe Alarms provides the best in home alarm systems to protect your home, family and loved ones.  With over a decade of know-how, we are the business families in the greater Toronto and surround areas have trusted for years to keep their homes and families protected. Never worry about your safety when you can have peace of mind delivered with Deluxe Alarms home security. When it comes to your home alarm, you can count on Deluxe Alarms to provide complete 24/7 safety.

Built into our service is the latest in home monitoring systems. We include emergency notification for your home with a fast response time for any kind of emergency from a prowler in your house to an unanticipated flood while you are away from home. 

Our home security alarm systems may also provide peace of mind with our special medical alert system. If you or a loved one is home alone with a health condition or at an age where the ability to call for help could be critical, we can help. This state of the art medical assistance system can aid anyone recovering from illness or facing lost mobility from aging to stay independent but always within reach of medical assistance. It can mean being able to enjoy life to the fullest and still have help available in an instant when needed.

Deluxe Alarms can create the right security package for your home. We offer complete home wiring packages, cell phone connections that allow you to monitor your homes safety from a distance (smart home monitoring), and security certificates that will bring your home insurance down and a wireless security system that works independent of the power grid to keep your home secure even in blackout conditions. We can deliver a home alarm security system for the best security money can buy at an affordable price only from Deluxe Alarms.

SetupTeam is Proudly Canadian Toronto based company that offers Professional Service for commercial and residential clients. We service and Insured for both Residential and Commercial customers. Our technicians have years of experience in the installation of TV's, Home theater and the IT industry. Every installation is always on time and on budget.
When a technician leaves your property everything will be cleaned-up double checked and running. All of our technicians are fully trained, insured, bonded Criminal Record Checked non-smokers and show the greatest respect when working in your home or offices

*TV wall mounting

For YOUR safety and peace of mind. Call us today for more info

profile:
Your smart home and theatre experts. From television and large screen projectors to smart thermostats and security cameras, we're here to help you with technology in your home. You need a service expert for today's modern home...that's us! We are a local based business that offers excellent service at a reasonable price and thanks to many referrals, continues to compete well against the larger big box stores. We encourage all customers to share reviews and follow us on social media platforms such as Facebook and Google
 --- The smart home today. Imagine the convenience of a door security camera and unlocking your front door from your phone. Outdoor LED lighting on smart daylight schedule timing. Get email and text alerts when your security or smoke alarm is activated. Save energy with smart wifi thermostats. Download and stream over your wireless Internet with ease throughout your entire home. Play music from your phone throughout your home on speakers installed anywhere you like, even the patio. Spend the evening out at home instead and enjoy a cinema like experience with THX surround sound and theater screens to match. Watch the big game on your wall mounted LED TV. Share and backup files, photos, videos & music.
service_area: Proudly serving the East Greater Toronto Area and Durham Region. Ajax, Bowmanville, Brooklin, Courtice, Markham, Oshawa, Pickering, Scarborough, Stouffville, Uxbridge, Whitby and more (please call to check if your area is not listed)
